body: the story, as i understand it: first, this science guy invents a magic nut pill! basically, if a man takes the pill, he goes butt crazy & spouts copious jizz. and if a lady tastes his magic pill jizz, then she also goes butt crazy, and the fucking, it commence. so, the science guy plays soccer w/ a co-worker who once gave him a jar of valuable flowers. but then an evil lady arrives! she captures him, breaks the valuable flower jar, and attempts to extract his nut. left with no choice, the science guy eats way too many pills and fully sauces the evil lady. of course the fucking, it commence. upon completion, the science guy, having gone butt crazy, runs away. in this state, he meets and non-consensually jizzes a concerned convenience store employee. the fucking, it futher commence, but with a panty on his head this time. the end.
